text: Moonlight Treasure Box | Secret Recipes lands Feb 17. Draw with Moonlight Crystals for Tea Savoring and Taste Relishing outfits, and the Moonlight Special guarantee finishes the reward list before 12 draws, so you never pull duplicates.
